participant_1.background:
My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
I've broken many things because of my clumsiness.
I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

participant_2.background:
I'm single and love my pets.
my favorite book that i ve read lately is middlesex.
I love running with my family and friends because we always have a good time together.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
I am a crafter who enjoys making things with my hands.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
Good, thanks for asking! I just finished reading middlesex, what did you think of it?
I haven't read that one yet, what is it about?
It is a historical fiction novel about a person who is born intersex. What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to go for walks in the woods, and I have a dog who loves to go with me. What do you do for work?
I am a crafter, and I love to make things with my hands. I also like to run with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to be creative too.
I do too! Where do you live? I live in the city, but I love to go to the suburbs to relax and enjoy nature.
I live in the suburbs, and I love the peace and quiet. I also love to go to the city to experience the energy.
That's awesome! I love that you can experience both worlds!
